alert.note: Alert for Chattooga; Floyd; Gordon (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 6:38PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Floyd, southwestern Gordon and central Chattooga Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 637 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Tidings, or near Summerville, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Rome, Summerville, Trion, Shannon, Tidings, Armuchee and James H. Floyd State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
